title: What is the Reward for Raising Daughters for both parents? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: says what is the reward for raising daughters for both parents our daughters a blessing unlike sons both are blessings and a gift from allah azzawajal but the hardship that may accompany raising up daughters is greater than the benefits that one gets from raising up boys that's why the prophet alaihi salafsalam encouraged and gave an incentive forever whomever is blessed with three daughters and he raises them and he upbrings them well and he gets them married that they will be a petition and saving a shield from him for him from uh uh hellfire and allah knows best you
